entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
